Zend_Gdata  
Gapps  
No 
No 

Description

Represents the apps:nickname element used by the Apps data API. This is used to describe a nickname's properties, and is usually contained within instances of Zend_Gdata_Gapps_NicknameEntry.

Methods

__construct, __toString, getDOM, getName, setName, takeAttributeFromDOM,

Description

Constructs a new Zend_Gdata_Gapps_Extension_Nickname object.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$name string | (optional) The nickname being represented. null

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

getDOM( DOMDocument   $doc = null,   $majorVersion = 1,   $minorVersion = null, ) : DOMElement

Description

Retrieves a DOMElement which corresponds to this element and all child properties. This is used to build an entry back into a DOM and eventually XML text for sending to the server upon updates, or for application storage/persistence.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$doc DOMDocument | The DOMDocument used to construct DOMElements null
$majorVersion n/a 1
$minorVersion n/a null

Return value

Type Description
DOMElement The DOMElement representing this element and all child properties.

Return value

Type Description
string The requested attribute.

Tags

Name Description
see setName

setName( string   $value, ) : Zend_Gdata_Gapps_Extension_Nickname

Description

Set the value for this element's name attribute. This name uniquely describes this nickname within the domain. Emails addressed to this name will be delivered to the user who owns this nickname.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$value string | The desired value for this attribute.

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Gapps_Extension_Nickname Provides a fluent interface.

takeAttributeFromDOM( DOMNode   $attribute, ) : n/a

Description

Given a DOMNode representing an attribute, tries to map the data into instance members. If no mapping is defined, the name and value are stored in an array.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$attribute DOMNode | The DOMNode attribute needed to be handled

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

Properties

$_name, $_rootElement, $_rootNamespace,

  protected  $_name = null

The name of the nickname. This name is used as the email address for this nickname.string


  protected  $_rootElement = nickname


  protected  $_rootNamespace = apps
